content: note this sweater is worked seamlessly from the top down in the round yoke increases are worked directly in the charted pattern materials 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 skeins amano uma 25g/230 yd #1901 us size 4 3 5 mm 16 & 32 circular knitting needles & set of dpns or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle stitch markers stitch holders gauge 19 sts = 4 27 row = 4 in stockinette stitch with larger needle after blocking finished measurements small medium large 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x bust 37 5 41 25 46 49 75 53 5 58 62 75 66 5 70 25 to fit bust 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 64
